title: The Cost of Capital, Corporation Finance and the Theory of Investment
relevance_note: Foundational statement of capital-structure irrelevance under frictionless markets; baseline for trade-off/pecking-order debates.

title: Corporate Income Taxes and the Cost of Capital: A Correction
relevance_note: Introduces corporate taxes to MM framework; establishes tax shield intuition for leverage benefits.

title: Theory of the Firm: Managerial Behavior, Agency Costs and Ownership Structure
relevance_note: Agency theory canonical reference; connects ownership, leverage, and incentive conflicts.

title: Distribution of Incomes of Corporations Among Dividends, Retained Earnings, and Taxes
relevance_note: Empirical model of dividend smoothing; anchor for dividend-policy discussions.

title: Dividend Policy, Growth, and the Valuation of Shares
relevance_note: Dividend irrelevance proposition; counterpoint to payout preference arguments.

title: The Capital Structure Puzzle
relevance_note: Frames trade-off vs. pecking-order theories; enduring reference for financing trade-offs.

title: The Theory and Practice of Corporate Finance: Evidence from the Field
relevance_note: CFO survey on WACC, capital budgeting (NPV/IRR), and capital structure—bridges theory and practice.

title: Testing Trade-Off and Pecking Order Predictions About Dividends and Debt
relevance_note: Large-sample empirical tests; nuanced evidence across payout and leverage decisions.

title: Testing the Pecking Order Theory of Capital Structure
relevance_note: Influential empirical assessment of pecking-order predictions.

title: Betas by Sector (US) – Current Data
relevance_note: Up-to-date sector betas and unlevered betas; practical inputs for WACC estimation.

title: Country Risk: Determinants, Measures and Implications (2025 Edition)
relevance_note: Methodology and tables for country equity risk premia (ERP/CRP)—key for cross-border WACC.

title: Principles of Corporate Finance (13th ed.)
relevance_note: Comprehensive textbook for capital budgeting, WACC, payout, and governance basics.

title: Valuation: Measuring and Managing the Value of Companies (7th ed.)
relevance_note: Practitioner playbook for DCF, value drivers, and performance diagnostics; includes downloadable DCF model.

title: Corporate Finance (Latest Release / 13th ed.)
relevance_note: Core reference for NPV/IRR, project analysis, and risk-adjusted discounting with updated pedagogy.
